text: BHA B.B.D. Bagh-Brabourne Rd. branch The Bengal Hawkers Association is a trade union of hawkers in West Bengal, India. BHA is affiliated with the Trade Union Coordination Committee. BHA was founded in 1950, and is the oldest hawkers union in the state. It gained a strong following amongst refugees from East Pakistan. ==References== Category:Trade Union Coordination Committee Category:Trade unions in West Bengal Category:Retail trade unions Category:Organisations based in Kolkata Category:Street vendors Category:Trade unions established in 1950
